remarks: Membership in the kernel of a functional.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lkrfval2.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lkrfval2.d $e |- D = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lkrfval2.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` D ) $.
lkrfval2.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
lkrfval2.k $e |- K = ( LKer ` W ) $.
ellkr2.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. Y ) $.
ellkr2.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
ellkr2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
ellkr2 $p |- ( ph -> ( X e. ( K ` G ) <-> ( G ` X ) = .0. ) ) $.
